about_me.title: About me
about_me.subtitle: I am a full stack web developer with specialization in frontend, focused on creating fast, interactive interfaces. and accessible. My approach is based on building mostly single page applications (SPA) optimized with modular code and reusable, prioritizing agile performance and reduced loading times. I implement good practices to ensure a quality experience.
